user-is-not-authorized-text-1: You are currently not logged in. If you have an account, you can
user-is-not-authorized-text-2: If you don't have an account yet, you can
acc-reg-want-to-repeat: I want to repeat my password
acc-reg-explanation-invite-text: Registration is currently available by invitation only. If you would like to receive an invitation, please contact me via
acc-reg-explanation-name: The account name must consist of one or two words in the Latin alphabet. The first letter of each word must be capitalized
acc-reg-explanation-password: The password must be longer than eight characters. Moreover, it can consist of absolutely any characters at your discretion. Password strength is entirely up to you
acc-reg-explanation-repeat: If you want to make sure you entered the password correctly, you can enter it again. It's not obligatory
acc-reg-name-just-taken: Unfortunately, someone just took over that name
acc-reg-bad-password: The password cannot be the same as the administrator password
